channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Managing Forms in React: Controlled Components vs. Formik
item.description: Compare traditional controlled components with the Formik library for handling complex form state and validation in React applications.

item.title: Server-Side Rendering with Next.js and React
item.description: Explore the benefits of server-side rendering and learn how to implement it in your React applications using the Next.js framework.
